original_text: Who, when he had found one pearl of great price, went and sold all that he had, and bought it.
korean_text: 극히 값진 진주 하나를 발견하매 가서 자기의 소유를 다 팔아 그 진주를 사느니라

sentences.original_text: Who, when he had found one pearl of great price,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 큰 값의 진주 하나를 발견했을 때,

sentences.original_text: went and sold all that he had,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 가진 모든 것을 팔러 갔고,
